betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Infused gems were greatly useful, they just had one slight downside - needing to be recharged at your base using centi-Vis. Or, in the case of point cut gems, being single use. If only you could recharge both gems, and on the go at that.

The Primordial Gauntlet allows you to do just that. Once crafted right-click a node in order to bind it within the gauntlet. Consider carefully what node to bind, because once bound it cannot be un-bound.

With a node captured the gauntlet is able to energize it, and use its centi-Vis to recharge oval cut gems, or release the power of point cut gems without breaking the gem in the process. The latter do have a short cooldown between activations, however.

Sneak-right click with the gauntlet to add or remove gems - there's a total of five sockets to slot gems into. Use the same button to change wand Foci to switch between active gems.

Crafting a Primordial Gauntlet doesn't §oentirely§r consume the Primordial Pearl. See the next quest for details.
